items.title: On a Cliffside in Oman, Para-Athlete Zainab Al-Eqabi Finds Her Freedom
items.excerpt: I was halfway up a cliff in northern Oman when I realized I hadn’t thought about my prosthesis in more than an hour—which, if you’ve ever worn one, you’ll know is no small thing. The socket was slick with sweat against my thigh. The ridge of my liner had started to roll slight…
